actions.text: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.
Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2953.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3176, under the order of 2/2/16, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to phase out tax preferences for fossil fuels on the same schedule as the phase out of the tax credits for wind facilities.
